roleset.name: (cause to) become used to

example.name: acclimate-v: all args. Arg0 is a cause
example.text: There has been much talk about this in recent years , and it almost seems as if this is a desensitization process [*] to acclimate people to the idea .

roleset.note: ACCLIMATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VN class, no FN class. Comparison to 'accustom.01'. (from acclimate.01-v)
